entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
